background-color.comment: The background color of the Promo component.

border.comment: The border of the Promo component.

margin.comment: The margin of the Promo component.

max-width.comment: The maximum width of the Promo component.

content-padding.comment: The padding for the content in the Promo component.

flag-content-padding.comment: The padding for the content in the Flag Promo component.

max-width-full.comment: Sets the maximum width of the Promo component to be full width.

breakpoint.comment: The Promo component breakpoint at which large viewport styles begin.

narrow-max-height.comment: The maximum height of the image in the Promo component on narrow viewports.

object-fit.comment: The object-fit setting of the image in the Promo component.

height.comment: The height for the image in the Promo component

width.comment: The width for the image in the Promo component

flag-narrow-max-width.comment: The maximum width of the Flag image in the Promo component on narrow viewports.

flag-padding.comment: The padding for the Flag image in the Promo component

flag-height.comment: The height for the Flag image in the Promo component

flag-width.comment: The width for the Flag image in the Promo component

color.comment: The title font color of the Promo component.

weight.comment: The title font weight of the Promo component.

color.comment: The subtitle font color of the Promo component.

weight.comment: The subtitle font weight of the Promo component.
